original_text: Then the Cushite arrived and said, “My lord the king, hear the good news! The Lord has vindicated you today by delivering you from the hand of all who rose up against you.”
korean_text: 구스 사람이 이르러 말하되 내 주 왕께 아뢸 소식이 있나이다 여호와께서 오늘 왕을 대적하던 모든 원수를 갚으셨나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: My lord the king, hear the good news!
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 주 왕이여, 좋은 소식을 들으세요!

sentences.original_text: The Lord has vindicated you today
by delivering you from the hand of all
